attributes.action: get tough on knife crime by not instructing magistrate courts to relax punishments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following an article in the Daily Mirror on 13/05/08, it would appear that courts have been instructed to 'go easy on thugs carrying weapons'.

The article states that 'knife carrying thugs could soon escape jail with just a fine or community service'. The article then adds that 'Cannabis dealers will also avoid prison under guidelines released to magistrates'.

We would like a full explanation as to how this is viewed as 'getting tough' on knife crime, and instead we would like to see tougher and much longer sentences for these crimes.

There is a growing trend for young people to carry knifes out onto our streets to be used solely as weapons, and we need to send out a clear message that this is totally unacceptable.
